"It's sweeter than watermelon and crunchier than pears!" Weifang's "ice cream radish" is famous for its purple-red skin and an interior that resembles ice cream. It delivers a sweet, non-spicy flavor.

result.text:
Cold Dew, the 17th solar term of the year, marks the arrival of late autumn. In some regions of #Shandong, people have the tradition of eating crabs and drinking autumn tea on this day. Do you know of any other customs associated with Cold Dew? Share them in the comments below!
#FriendlyShandong #MeetingtheSeaAlongtheYellowRiver #ShandongCulture #24ChineseSolarTerms #ColdDew #China #AutumnShandong

result.text:
In autumn, #Taishan Caishi Creek in Tai'an is like a vibrant oil painting. The landscape is covered in a sea of red leaves, with springs bubbling and waterfalls cascading down the mountainside, creating a picturesque and breathtaking view.

result.text:
When you come to the Yellow River Delta, don't miss the art of dough sculpture! Here, dough sculpture combines the strengths of various styles and local culture while blending tradition with modern elements, making it truly unique!
Location: Dongying, Shandong
#FriendlyShandong #RemarkableShandong #ShandongCulture #ShandongTips

#FriendlyShandong #MeetingtheSeaAlongtheYellowRiver #CharmingShandong #ShandongTips #AutumnShandong

In golden autumn, Guanshi Pomegranate Garden in #Yicheng, #Zaozhuang, Shandong, is having a bountiful harvest. Dubbed the "world's top pomegranate garden," it's an eco-cultural hotspot blending nature, history, and sightseeing.
